de.unlixx.runpng.png.io

Class PngChunkOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.FilterOutputStream
        • java.io.DataOutputStream
          • de.unlixx.runpng.png.io.PngChunkOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.io.DataOutput, java.io.Flushable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class PngChunkOutputStream
extends java.io.DataOutputStream
    PngChunkOutputStream based on DataOutputStream. This class writes a chunked png file (animated or not) to an output stream.
